moduleMetadataJson.name: Windows Capture Winlogon Lockout Credential Keylogger
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module migrates and logs Microsoft Windows user's passwords via
          Winlogon.exe using idle time and natural system changes to give a
          false sense of security to the user.
author: mubix <mubix@hak5.org>
cg

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: INTERVAL
options.description: Time between key collection during logging

options.name: LOCKTIME
options.description: Amount of idle time before lockout

options.name: PID
options.description: Target PID, only needed if multiple winlogon.exe instances exist

options.name: WAIT
options.description: Wait for lockout instead of default method
